description: This is a React functional component named 'ShortcutsOverlay' that renders an overlay displaying keyboard shortcuts for a web application. It accepts props for closing the overlay and a flag to determine if it functions as a standalone overlay or attached to another element.

methods.name: ShortcutsOverlay({ onClose, standalone = false })
methods.description: React functional component rendering a keyboard shortcuts overlay, with optional close functionality and display mode.

ctags.name: ShortcutsOverlay
ctags.pattern: /^export default function ShortcutsOverlay({ onClose, standalone = false }) {$/
